entry.title: Guanbin Xu
entry.content: Who am I? Hello, I am Guanbin Xu(许冠斌)! Now I am studying at the Department of Computer Science at University of Science and Technology of China (USTC). And I am a Master candidate in USTC, advised by Prof. Cheng Li. I earned my Bachelor’s Degree at Sichuan University. Contact me E-mail: gb.xu@outlook.com LinKedin: Guanbin Xu Tech blog: GB Github: gbxu Research Interests My research interests include distributed systems, machine learning. Projects & Competitions Pita, a general distributed machine learning systems(DML) platform. We propose this platform to improve the dynamic scalability, fault tolerance and efficiency of utilizing resource of DML Publications (Google Scholar)None InternshipsNone Teaching Assistance “Graph Theory” at USTC - 011040 Fall 2018, Tutor: Yinlong Xu & Min Lv Hobby I started running since 2015. And now I almost run 5km every night. I am interested in hiking and climbing mountain. I had climbed Mount Qingcheng, Mount Ermei, Yading(which locates in the south west of Sichuan Province and has a much charming landscape). I also swim or play pingpong, basketball or tennis sometimes. I take huge pleasure in photograph. I will try it soon. #0 “在隆冬，我终于知道，我身上有一个不可战胜的夏天。” –阿尔贝·加缪 “The proof of a system’s value is its existence.” –Alan J. Perlis one piece of advice to give to students - Andrew Ng’s Answer: When deciding how to spend your time, I recommend you take into account two criteria: Whether what you’re doing can change the world. How much you’ll learn.
